articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Asian Business Sentiment Bounces Back, but Caution Abounds: Thomson Reuters/INSEAD Survey - The New York Times
articles.description: Confidence among Asian businesses rebounded sharply this quarter to hit an 18-month high with firms reporting a pickup in sales, though most are holding off on hiring as trade war uncertainty weighs, a Thomson Reuters/INSEAD survey found.
articles.content:
For a graphic on Business sentiment index, click https://fingfx.thomsonreuters.com/gfx/editorcharts/ASIA-BUSINESSSENTIMENT/0H001QXN59RG/eikon.png

articles.description: The authorities can scan your phones, track your face and find out when you leave your home. One of the world’s biggest spying networks is aimed at regular people, and nobody can stop it.
